sentence in indonesian using the words: Keponakan saya suka bermain di taman.
english translation: "My nephew/niece likes to play at the park."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah seorang dokter yang baik.
english translation: "He/She is a good doctor."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah sepupu saya yang tinggal di kota.
english translation: "He/She is my cousin who lives in the city."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah putra tunggal keluarga itu.
english translation: "He is the only son of that family."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Putri saya bermain di halaman belakang.
english translation: "My daughter is playing in the backyard."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saudari saya adalah orang yang paling baik hati.
english translation: "My sister is the kindest person."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tante Lisa bekerja sebagai seorang guru.
english translation: "Aunt Lisa works as a teacher."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Abang saya sedang belajar di perpustakaan.
english translation: "My older brother is studying at the library."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ibu saya akan melahirkan sebentar lagi.
english translation: "My mother will give birth soon."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sangat senang mendengar dia sedang hamil.
english translation: "I am very happy to hear that she is pregnant."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Mertua saya tinggal di luar kota.
english translation: "My in-laws live outside the city."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Menantu saya adalah seorang dokter hebat.
english translation: "My son/daughter-in-law is a great doctor."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ipar saya akan datang berkunjung besok.
english translation: "My brother/sister-in-law will come visit tomorrow."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bapak saya pergi ke kantor sejak pagi.
english translation: "My father went to the office since morning."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ibunda saya sedang memasak di dapur.
english translation: "My mother is cooking in the kitchen."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bunda memberikan saya hadiah ulang tahun yang indah.
english translation: "Mom gave me a beautiful birthday present."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kemenakan saya suka bermain bola.
english translation: "My nephew/niece likes to play soccer."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kakek saya meninggal dunia tahun lalu.
english translation: "My grandfather passed away last year."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia mati dalam kecelakaan mobil.
english translation: "He/She died in a car accident."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya membuat sup labu untuk makan malam.
english translation: "I am making pumpkin soup for dinner."
